data.message: I would love to go on Sunday 10th December & I would take my Beautiful Mum as she would have only been back in the country for 6 days. She lives in Dammam and I don’t get to see here enough & after being on my own last Christmas she made sure she would be back this year so after months of not seeing her Id love nothing more than a Christmas Boogie with her. Stephanie. #capitalfm #CapitalJBB #holidaysarecoming #cocacola #motherandson

replies.message: This would be purely magical son .. what a way to reaffirm the Christmas values .. love you baby bear xxx
